q_en: Please release 100 units of cotton fabric from the Main warehouse.
gt:
Sure thing! We've successfully released 100 units of Cotton Fabric from the Main Warehouse. ðŸŽ‰

Here's a quick summary of the current status:

| Material       | Warehouse      | Units Released | Units Remaining |
|----------------|----------------|----------------|-----------------|
| Cotton Fabric  | Main Warehouse | 100            | 3400            |

If you need anything else, just let me know! ðŸ˜Š

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM warehouse WHERE name = 'Main Warehouse';
steps.description: Retrieve the warehouse ID for the warehouse with the name "Main Warehouse"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM materials WHERE name = 'Cotton Fabric';
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID for the material with the name "Cotton Fabric"

steps.sql: SELECT id, left_number FROM warehouse_material WHERE warehouse_id = '1' AND material_id = '1';
steps.description: Retrieve the warehouse material record for "Cotton Fabric" in "Main Warehouse"

steps.sql: UPDATE warehouse_material SET left_number = left_number - 100 WHERE id = '1';
steps.description: Update the left number of "Cotton Fabric" in "Main Warehouse" by releasing 100 units
